item.description:
This is the eighth session of our HAC group, in which we work through a readable guide to the bizarre logic and historical inaccuracy of the Hebrew Bible.

Please read the following sections from our series reference How to Read the Bible: A Guide to Scripture, Then and Now, by James L. Kugel.

  • Chapter 24. The Other Gods of Canaan, pages 417-435
  • Chapter 25. Samuel and Saul, pages 436-457
  • Chapter 26. The Psalms of David, pages 458-473

And read the following:

  • The Wikipedia article on Books of Samuel.
  • The Wikipedia article on Psalms.
  • Read a few Psalms. One of the many places where you can find a collection of the Psalms is at http://www.mechon-mam...


Please catch up with the readings from the earlier sessions. You'll get more out of the group if you're aware of Kugel's approach to the source material, which is explained in chapter 1 of his book.

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll probably be in the social hall or the library.
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Bible Reading Group
